alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 14 at 2:55PM CDT until July 14 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 255 PM CDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Starkville. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
